content:
TITLE: Mapping LDAP Attribute Syntax OIDs to Java Classes
DESCRIPTION: Defines how LDAP attribute syntax OIDs should be mapped to specific Java classes when working with Spring LDAP. The mapping includes Integer representation for syntax 1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.50 and byte array representation for syntax 1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.40.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/odm/src/test/resources/syntax-to-class-map.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: properties
CODE:
```
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.50, java.lang.Integer
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.40, [B
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: LDAP Binary Attribute Syntax Mappings in Properties Format
DESCRIPTION: A configuration listing of LDAP syntax OIDs mapped to attributes that use those syntaxes. These syntaxes are returned as byte arrays by the JNDI provider. The list is derived from JNDI documentation and RFC 2256.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/odm/src/main/resources/org/springframework/ldap/odm/tools/binary-attributes.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: properties
CODE:
```
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.23  photo, personalSignature 
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.4   audio 
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.28  jpegPhoto
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.40  javaSerializedData
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.40  userPassword
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.8   userCertificate, cACertificate 
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.9   authorityRevocationList, certificateRevocationList 
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.10  crossCertificatePair
1.3.6.1.4.1.1466.115.121.1.6   x500UniqueIdentifier
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Spring LDAP Test System Properties Configuration
DESCRIPTION: System properties configuration for Spring LDAP integration tests. Allows switching between in-process ApacheDS and external LDAP servers, with options to specify connection details and test behavior.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/test/integration-tests/readme.itest.config.md#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: properties
CODE:
```
-Dspring.profiles.active=no-apacheds
-Durl=<ldap server url>
-DuserDn=<ldap user dn>
-Dpassword=<ldap password>
-Dbase=<LDAP base DN>
-Dadtest
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Running Automated OpenLDAP Tests on AWS EC2 with Maven
DESCRIPTION: Command to execute automated tests that launch OpenLDAP on EC2 instances. Requires AWS account credentials as command-line parameters for authentication and authorization.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/test/integration-tests-openldap/README-EC2-tests.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
mvn -Daws.key=<Your AWS Account Key> -Daws.secret.key=<Your AWS secret key> test
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Optional AWS EC2 Configuration Parameters for OpenLDAP Tests
DESCRIPTION: Additional parameters for customizing the EC2 instance configuration when running OpenLDAP tests. These options allow specifying the AMI image, AWS key, and security group for the launched instance.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/test/integration-tests-openldap/README-EC2-tests.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: shell
CODE:
```
-Daws.ami=<Your AMI image identifier>
-Daws.key=<The AWS key to use when launching the instance>
-Daws.security.group=<The AWS security group to use when launching the instance>
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Spring LDAP Snapshot Download URL Configuration
DESCRIPTION: The URL path where the PHP page for Spring LDAP snapshot downloads should be located. This PHP page processes XML listings from S3 and transforms them into download links using XSLT.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/etc/snapshotzipbuilds/readme.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
https://docs.spring.io/spring-ldap/downloads/1.3-snapshot-download.php
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Standard Apache License 2.0 Header with Copyright Notice
DESCRIPTION: The standard copyright and Apache License 2.0 header used in Spring LDAP project files. It includes the copyright years placeholder, license statement, and reference to the license URL.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/etc/checkstyle/header.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
/*
 * Copyright 20xx-20xx the original author or authors.
 *
 * Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
 * you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
 * You may obtain a copy of the License at
 *
 *      https://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0
 *
 * Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
 * distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
 * WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
 * See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
 * limitations under the License.
 */
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Required End-User Documentation Acknowledgement Text
DESCRIPTION: The mandatory acknowledgement text that must be included in end-user documentation when redistributing Spring LDAP.
SOURCE: https://github.com/spring-projects/spring-ldap/blob/main/notice.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: text
CODE:
```
"This product includes software developed by the Spring LDAP\n      Project (https://www.springframework.org/ldap)."
```
